articles.author: Gerrit De Vynck
articles.title: Trump defies GOP critics by signing controversial order threatening states over AI laws - The Washington Post
articles.description: Trump’s latest executive order attempts to punish states that regulate artificial intelligence technology, a policy that has triggered division in the GOP.
articles.content: SAN FRANCISCO President Donald Trump signed an executive order Thursday directing the federal government to file lawsuits against states that introduce regulations on artificial intelligence technolo… [+214 chars]

articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: Google debuts ‘Disco,’ a Gemini-powered tool for making web apps from browser tabs - TechCrunch
articles.description: Google Labs is testing a product that will work with your browser tabs to make web apps for you.
articles.content: Google on Thursday introduced a new AI experiment for the web browser: the Gemini-powered product Disco, which helps to turn your open tabs into custom applications. With Disco, you can create what G… [+2115 chars]
